item.description:
The topic of this event is business blogging for leads and clients. We’ll talk about how blogging can position you as a thought leader in your industry, and open the door to more clients, speaking opportunities, and JV partnerships.

The Marketing Cafe™ is the online radio show that features simple, yet highly effective ideas for solopreneurs and small business owners like you who want to make a good living while making a difference in the world.

Get Show Access Info here: http://bit.ly/P53IoP

Date: Thursday, December 6, 2012

Time: 12 noon Eastern Time
(48 hour replay available if your schedule doesn't cooperate).

The featured guest speaker is Sarah Santacroce, small business internet & social media marketing mentor.

Your host is marketing results coach Mark Reinert, founder of Authentic Business Growth, LLC and the creator of the Business Growth Dojo™ the business incubator for independent professionals and owners of small service-based businesses.

Get Show Access Info here: http://bit.ly/P53IoP

During this program you will learn:

  • The four big benefits of writing regular blog articles
  • How to move people from blog reader to prospective client.
  • How often and how much to write to get the best results.
  • Examples of how you can get blog readers to subscribe to your email list.
  • Key differences between blog article strategy and email list strategies. (This is confusing for many people, but not that complicated once you understand it.)
  • How to get more readers, especially when you’re starting out.
  • What to do if you’re not a good writer.

Get Show Access Info here: http://bit.ly/P53IoP
item.name: Marketing Cafe: Blogging For Leads
